item.title: Burial DBMS: Client Dashboard with FastAPI, SQLite, and JWT Auth
item.description: 📋 Project Summary # Burial DBMS is a full-stack web application that serves as a digital platform for managing burial plans and client contracts. The system supports user authentication, slot management, payment processing, contract generation, and deceased information. This project was built using FastAPI, SQLite, and vanilla JS with plans to integrate full JWT authentication, session management, and PDF receipt downloads. GitHub Repository: github.com/yourname/burial-dbms 🧭 Features # 🔐 JWT Authentication: Clients can securely log in and retain session state via tokens.
